1467970.name: Dragon Dash Division
1467970.description:
Dragon Dash Division
It's a single player flight racing game that flies through the jungle.
- Short and simple jungle course is offered -

Control your dragon to fly as fast as possible!
Avoid obstacles and get mushrooms for faster lap times!


Enhance your dragon with stat up points earned every time you clear the map

- Speed ​​stat upgrade : Dragon speed increased
- Boost Stat upgrade : Dragon boost effect increased
- Move stat upgrade : Dragon mobility Increased

The fastest record is recorded on the ranking page
